title: 3 and Out - Myles Garrett TNF Meltdown;  Rapid Fire Friday, Kaepernick Workout Mess; Week 11 Preview ATS; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Myles Garrett TNF Meltdown;  Rapid Fire Friday, Kaepernick Workout Mess; Week 11 Preview ATS; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, Middlekauff looks at the Myles Garrett's helmet attack at the end of the TNF win over the Steelers, Garrett potential suspension, bounces around the league's hottest storylines in Rapid Fire Friday, how the NFL has turned Colin Kaepernick's workout into a mess. He also previews the slate of Week 11 NFL games. He also answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
